content:
Does anyone have a preview of what the NCQA CQL statements for diabetes and hypertension might look like? These aren't in the HEDIS 2022 bundles; was wondering if anyone has worked on these as part of a connectathon.

I found this for hypertension, but I believe this was a CMS connectathon: https://github.com/DBCG/connectathon/blob/master/fhir4/input/pagecontent/cql/EXM165_FHIR4-8.5.000.cql

@Michael Ryan in case he has any info here.
@Luke Smith @Matt Willer in case they want to follow.

@Daniel Tam , here is a more recent Diabetes: https://github.com/cqframework/ecqm-content-r4-2021/blob/master/input/cql/DiabetesHemoglobinA1cHbA1cPoorControl9FHIR.cql, and here is a more recent Controlling Blood Pressure: https://github.com/cqframework/draft-measures/blob/master/pages/cql/in-progress/fhir401/EXM165_FHIR4-9.2.000.cql
They are CMS eCQMs, so I don't know how close they are to what the HEDIS measures will be.
Thanks! I'll take these in lieu of the HEDIS ones.
